title: Could someone explain how MMR works?
body: This whole thing confuses the absolute crap out of me. I realise that there are a LOT of components to this and this would be a TONNE of explaining to do but I really do feel like understanding this is important. Even if you just explained bits of it or linked to an article I could read, would be lovely xD

replies.body: Thank you so much! Currently in Bronze 5 :/ Gaining around 25-30 LP per win and losing about 10 per lose, does that mean I have a high MMR?

Are you asking about the Mathematics behind ranked?

-SumCoolAid

MMR = Skill level and when playing ranked you're placed in a game with 9 players of similar MMR (skill level). MMR also determines how much LP you gain/lose for a W/L.
Higher win% = Higher MMR = More LP gained per win and less LP lost per loss.
Lower win% = Lower MMR = Less LP gained per win and more LP lost per loss.

If you're a good player then you will fly up the ranks until you reach where you belong and if you're a bad player then you'll be punished severely and climbing will be nearly impossible.

your "rank" ie 10 in gold 5 annies captains or w/e
is actually completely irrelevant because you have to fall so hard in mmr to actually lose a div
Its pretty much
Oh im gold 5
but im losing alot sitting quite often on 0 points but to actually fall I pretty much have to be silver 5 mmr
if you were sitting low or your mmr was low, you will be placed sigificantly lower than where you ended up before season 5 because you wernt actually there you were way lower mmr wise.
This is why you see plats in mid/low gold games (most of the time the higher elo you get the less likely this is actually an mmr problem and more a player supply problem esp on a smaller server like oce.) golds in low silver games etc. etc. etc.

Your actual div/bracket is for bragging purposes only ( to an extent) when you get high up in a bracket ie div 1 to actually get there you have to gain alot of mmr, this is why you can start gaining very very little EVEN 0! now this can happen at any div but its the same principle; because the system is trying to fix ur mmr to be at a level where you should be to get promoted to the mmr number they set as the target for the next bracket ie (bronze>silver>gold>plat>dia>mas)
